description:
I am interested in  serius relationship or marriage.
My name is Jose luis, to serve you.
I was born and have spent all my life in the city of puebla, country of MEXICO.
I am 47 years old. (05/1974)
I am an honest man and without vices.
I have no criminal record, I do not have money debts.
I am a single man, I have never married, I have never lived with any woman, I do not have a girlfriend, I do not have children, I have no commitments of any kind.
I am an industrial electrical mechanic, work giving maintenance and service to machinery and equipment.
I like sports, I practice marathon races of 20 and 42 kilometers.
I am looking for a nice and intelligent woman like you to start a family.
We can start with a friendship to know us and with the constant treatment and good communication if the understanding and the affection between both arise, we can reach a stable and permanent relationship.
I will wait for your answer.
Have a nice day.
see you soon.
